5  ARMAFilter::ARMAFilter(const std::vector<double>& AR, const std::vector<double>& MA, double gain)
6  :
7  mAR(AR.size()),
8  mMA(MA.size()),
9  mGain(1.0 / gain),
10  mInPointer(0),
11  mOutPointer(0),
12  mInBuffer(MA.size()),
13  mOutBuffer(AR.size()) {
14  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mAR.size(); i++) {
15  mAR(i) = AR[i] / AR[0];
16  }
17 
18  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMA.size(); i++) {
19  mMA(i) = MA[i];
20  }
21 
22  mInBuffer.clear();
23  mOutBuffer.clear();

25  }

31  void ARMAFilter::operator()(SeqViewDouble& in, SeqViewDouble& out) {
32  Dmatrix* data_in = in.GetData();
33  Dmatrix* data_out = out.GetData();
34 
35  if (data_in->size1() != 1) {
36 
37  }
38  if ((data_in->size2() != data_out->size2()) || (data_in->size1() != data_out->size1())) {
39  data_out->resize(data_in->size1(), data_in->size2());
40  LogWarning("ARMAFilter: resizing output view");
41  }
42 
43  execute(*data_in, *data_out, in.GetScale());
44 
45 
46  // Adjust attributes
47  out.SetStart(in.GetStart());
48  out.SetSampling(in.GetSampling());
49  out.SetScale(1.0);
50  }
51 
52  void ARMAFilter::execute(Dmatrix& in, Dmatrix& out, double scale) {
53  unsigned int data = in.size2();
54  int m = mAR.size();
55  int n = mMA.size();
56  // ---- filters all the data ----
57  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < data; i++) {
58  mInBuffer(mInPointer) = mGain * scale * in(0, i);
59  long double val = 0.0;
60  for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) val += mMA[j] * mInBuffer((mInPointer + j) % n);
61  for (int j = 1; j < m; j++) val += mAR[j] * mOutBuffer((mOutPointer + j) % m);
62  mOutBuffer(mOutPointer) = val;
63  out(0, i) = val;
64  //fprintf(stderr,"%g\n",out(0,i));
65  mInPointer = ((mInPointer - 1 + n) % n);
66  mOutPointer = ((mOutPointer - 1 + m) % m);
67  }
68  }
69 
70  void ARMAFilter::SetFilter(const std::vector<double>& AR, const std::vector<double>& MA, double gain) {
71  mAR.resize(AR.size());
72  mMA.resize(MA.size());
73  mInPointer = 0;
74  mOutPointer = 0;
75  mInBuffer(MA.size());
76  mOutBuffer(AR.size());
77  mGain = 1.0 / gain;
78 
79  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mAR.size(); i++) {
80  mAR(i) = AR[i] / AR[0];
81  }
82 
83  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMA.size(); i++) {
84  mMA(i) = MA[i];
85  }
86 
87  mInBuffer.clear();
88  mOutBuffer.clear();
89  }
